name: Svelte Task Management Dashboard
description: Build a comprehensive task management dashboard
prompt:
Create a task management dashboard with:
- Task creation, editing, and deletion
- Status tracking (todo, in-progress, completed)
- Priority levels and due dates
- Categories and tags
- Search and filter functionality
- Data visualization and analytics
- User preferences and settings
- Export capabilities
- Responsive design
- Accessibility features

Requirements:
- Use Svelte framework features
- Implement proper state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include loading states
- Ensure responsive design
- Add accessibility compliance
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Svelte E-commerce Product Catalog
description: Build an e-commerce product catalog with filtering
prompt:
Create an e-commerce product catalog with:
- Product grid and list views
- Advanced filtering and sorting
- Search functionality with autocomplete
- Product comparison features
- Wishlist functionality
- Shopping cart integration
- User reviews and ratings
- Product recommendations
- Pagination and infinite scroll
- Mobile-optimized design

Requirements:
- Use framework-specific best practices
- Implement efficient state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include loading states
- Ensure responsive design
- Add accessibility features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Svelte Analytics Dashboard
description: Build a data analytics dashboard with charts
prompt:
Create an analytics dashboard with:
- Multiple chart types (line, bar, pie, area)
- Real-time data updates
- Interactive filters and date ranges
- Data export functionality
- Customizable widgets
- Data table with sorting and pagination
- Responsive layout
- Dark/light theme support
- Drill-down capabilities
- Performance metrics

Requirements:
- Use charting libraries (Chart.js, D3.js, etc.)
- Implement real-time data updates
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include data processing logic
- Ensure responsive design
- Add accessibility features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Svelte Social Media Platform
description: Build a social media platform with feed functionality
prompt:
Create a social media platform with:
- User profiles and authentication
- Post creation with text and images
- News feed with infinite scroll
- Like, comment, and share functionality
- Real-time notifications
- Search and discovery features
- Friend/follower system
- Direct messaging
- Content moderation tools
- Mobile-responsive design

Requirements:
- Implement complex state management
- Use real-time features
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include authentication logic
- Ensure responsive design
- Add security features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Svelte Educational Platform
description: Build an educational platform with course management
prompt:
Create an educational platform with:
- Course catalog and search
- Video player with progress tracking
- Quiz and assessment system
- Student dashboard
- Instructor tools
- Certificate generation
- Discussion forums
- Assignment submission
- Progress analytics
- Mobile-responsive design

Requirements:
- Use video player integration
- Implement progress tracking
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include assessment logic
- Ensure responsive design
- Add accessibility features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
